ComicInfo.Summary:
The journey to enlightenment is not an easy one. Past karma, conflicts, emotions and judgements cloud the path of three reluctant heroes as they battle their own inner demons while fighting evil in a black ops unit called the Deceivers. In this emotional issue, secrets are revealed and the hidden realm of the Draconian Warrior is unveiled as Kaila risks everything to help Justin understand the conflicts of his past. But his presence sparks an uprising not seen in Atlantis since its destruction thousands of years before. In the rage of battle, Kaila discovers deceit that rips into her very soul, beginning a catharsis that cuts her off from everyone she knows and loves. With the special recap book included, this becomes the perfect starting point for new readers!
